Sentencas: Doping of oxide surfaces with Ag atoms could improve their catalytic properties, e.g. for solid oxide fuel cell and oxygen permeation membrane applications.
Titulo: First principles modeling of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (001) surfaces

Sentencas: We present results of the ab initio calculations of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (LMO) (001) surfaces.
Titulo: First principles modeling of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (001) surfaces

Sentencas: The energetically most favorable adsorption sites for low coverage of Ag atoms and monolayer on both MnO2- and LaO-terminations have been determined.
Titulo: First principles modeling of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (001) surfaces

Sentencas: The electron charge transfer between Ag and substrate and interatomic distances have been analyzed.
Titulo: First principles modeling of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (001) surfaces

Sentencas: The Ag atom migration along the MnO2 surface is similar to 0.5 eV which could lead to a fast clustering of adsorbates at moderate temperatures whereas the adhesion energy of silver monolayer is relatively low which could indicate its mechanical instability.
Titulo: First principles modeling of Ag adsorption on the LaMnO3 (001) surfaces
